Errors.Error1000:
Customer service message 1001:

for the dates selected.

with your travel planning. Call us 24 Hours a Day,

Errors.Error10024:
Customer service message 10024:

In order to protect the privacy and
security of your interactions,
europeandestinations.com times out sessions
after 120 minutes of inactivity.
Any transactions for which you have
received confirmation during the
session are not affected,
however you must restart any
searches or any incomplete transactions.

Please return to the
europeandestinations.com home page.

Call us 24 Hours a Day, 7 Days a Week
toll-free 1-800-430-0484.

Msg:Rule0003

for prices within @MaxDayToPrice@ days
from today.

Please change your dates and
try your search again.
Errors.ErrorRule0004:

for the latest prices

our system only maintains prices for
itineraries created within
the last @MaxSessionTolerancehour@ hours.

Please price your itinerary again.
